Description: When detective Duncan Hatcher is summoned to the stately home of Judge Cato Laird to investigate a killing, he realises that discretion is key if he wants to keep his job. Elise, the judge's trophy wife, claims to have shot and killed a burglar in self-defence, but Duncan is almost certain she's lying..
